column1: ep1_notifications.0011.t0:"You have changed your Court Language"
ep1_notifications.0011.desc0:"May our Court grow ever grander!"
ep1_notifications.0012.desc0:"[target_character.GetShortUINameNoTooltip]'s court now speaks [target_character.GetCourtLanguage.GetName]. May their decision prove folly!"
ep1_notifications.0013.desc0:"[target_character.GetShortUINameNoTooltip]'s court now speaks [target_character.GetCourtLanguage.GetName]. A most wise decision!"
